text: Cherknukhi () is a rural locality (a village) in Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 45 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Poludennaya River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Cherknukhi
